channel.title: Need help ASAP ):
channel.description: I'm honestly only experienced with 317-5something servers, and I just downloaded Zenith and I have no idea how to do ANYTHING. Can anybody help me or teach me the basics, or link me a video or tutorial? I can pay for you tutoring me if you need.. Anybody help? \:

item.title: Need help ASAP ):
item.dc:creator: @siz siz
item.description:
@siz wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:8, topic:477218”][quote author=siz link=topic=595411.msg4192582#msg4192582 date=1357027413]

Learn how to code with Java before jumping into a RSPS.

Sorry, I was only experiences with 317-5somethingyolo
I didn’t know where some stuff was located but people helped me figure it out. Don’t need to be an asshole to me about it.
[/quote]
I wasn’t being an asshole, I was being serious. Look at thread count in this section. It’s the most in the community, majority of it being filled up with people who ask simple Java related questions because they just jump into RSPS’s because they think that the concept is cool without and knowledge of Java.[/quote]I know you weren’t, I just read it and typed w/o thinking. I’m sorry for insulting you. :

Read full topic

item.title: Need help ASAP ):
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

@PvM–People try to help it’s just that not many people can code 700+. Ill help you and tell you this…Go onto zenith client and search for loader.java…Then do cntrl+f and find the server port…Change that to 127.0.0.1…Your done…There are usually 3 or 4 u need to change to 127.0.0.1…I suggest that you start on a 317 just to get the hang of coding and work your way up…

@Siz–After a 317 (like i told PvM) i suggest you go to a 500-600…Then go up to 700’s…If you dont want to…I told PvM how to change ip…Do that and then i suggest you do the basics like spawn npc (done in npcspawning.java) which is source side…Then you can mostly find guides for the rest of the basics.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help ASAP ):
item.dc:creator: @PvM_Micro PvM Micro
item.description:
@PvM_Micro wrote:

don’t worry bro your not the only one. I just wish people in this forum were a little more helpful >.>
Zenith is the first server that i’m every trying to work on and I can’t even connect to the Local Host, umm…
where is the local host, and how do i change the Ip to my Ip? thanks

Read full topic
